description: This file defines a React functional component named LocationSearch, which provides a search bar for users to input a city name and dispatches a custom event with the search query. It manages internal state for the input value, loading status, and errors, and calls a callback onLocation when a search is submitted.

methods.name: LocationSearch({ onLocation })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a search form for location input, managing state, and dispatching search events.

methods.name: handleSubmit(e)
methods.description: Handles form submission, dispatches custom event, calls onLocation callback, manages loading and error states.
